additionalinformation: Fujinon Lens: f=60mm, 1:12.7, 2 components, 2 elements Film Feed-out Automatic Exposure Control: Auto exposure measurement. Manual switching system (flashing LED indicator signals recommended setting) Picture Size: 2.13" x 3.4" (54mm x 86mm) Auto Power Off Time: 5 minutes Exposure counter (number of unexposed film sheets), film pack confirmation window Uses Fujifilm INSTAX mini film
